Paragraph.Text: Long-range, fast, CryoPlasm defence, designed to fire in long-distance straight lines. Excellent when paired with terraforming work and Melters, the Dazzler requires 250k power to trigger. Once there is a sufficient density of CryoPlasm along one of the cardinal directions, it will charge, and then begin to fire. Once triggered will burn through power and CryoPlasm until there is no more CryoPlasm or power.
Please note - exposure to the beam will prove to be instantly fatal. Listen out for the charging noise and stay clear!
